items.sentence: You need to take your shoes off before entering.
Who'll take care of your house when you're away?
Tom climbed all the way to the top of the tower.
I'm really busy today, otherwise I would accept.
I'm thinking about putting my house up for sale.
I'm sorry. I wish I could take back what I said.
My neighborhood has a parade on the 4th of July.
Tom will have to come here to apologize to Mary.
Are you convinced this is the right thing to do?
I showed Tom the painting that I was working on.
There exist no published studies on this matter.
Tom asked me if I knew anybody who spoke French.
Think about it carefully before you do anything.
Why didn't you just ask somebody for directions?
Would you have time to come over this afternoon?
Having met Tom before, I recognized him at once.
When Tom was here, he would swim in the morning.
Tom walked past Mary's car without realizing it.
I don't care what people think about me anymore.
Tom barely managed to keep his head above water.
